title: Cardinals, NFL draft, Russell Westbrook, and the NBA playoffs
itunes:title: Cardinals, NFL draft, Russell Westbrook, and the NBA playoffs
description:
With the NFL draft a few days away Colin discusses the Arizona Cardinals now being reported to draft QB Kyler Murray, and the latest rumor about the Oakland Raiders. Colin also explains why Oklahoma City Thunder G Russell Westbrook is a horrible warning and his picks for the NBA playoffs. Guests include Doug Gottlieb, Lincoln Riley, Sam Monson, and LaVar Arrington.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
